Title: Bakunyuu Maid Kari
Description: ['Miwako Shirasaki is hired by her schoolmate Ai to work by her side at a maid cafe.', '\n', '\r\nBut none of them know that somewhere in Akihabara an underground organisation called "Maid masters" abduct young waitresses to confine and rape them...']
Staff: [['Tominaga, Tsuneo', 'Episode Director, Storyboard'], ['Yoshiten', 'Character Design, Key Animation, Animation Director'], ['Mogudan', 'Original Creator'], ['Hifumi', 'Art Director']]
